content: प्रलंब {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Pendulous, hanging down; as in प्रलंबकेश. {@--2@} Prominent; as in प्रलंबनासिकः. {@--3@} Slow, dilatory. --बः {@--1@} Hanging on or from, depending. {@--2@} Anything hanging down. {@--3@} A branch. {@--4@} A garland worn round the neck. {@--5@} A kind of necklace. {@--6@} The female breast. {@--7@} Tin or lead. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon killed by Balarāma. {@--9@} A shoot of the vinepalm. {@--10@} A cucumber. {@--11@} A verse (गाथा).
